siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Well-ordered, extremely user friendly app that will make your invoicing a child's play. Generate professional PDF invoices in a glance. Change your logo, labels and more to make your invoice fit your business requirements.
blogPost.body: Well-ordered, extremely user friendly app that will make your invoicing a child's play. Generate professional PDF invoices in a glance. Change your logo, labels and more to make your invoice fit your business requirements.
blogPost.title: Dippper - The simplest online tool for creating high-quality invoices.
blogPost.author: oussama hamdaoui

localize.description: 秩序井然，极其人性化的应用，让你的发票开具变得像个孩子一样。生成专业的PDF发票，一目了然。更改你的商标、标签等，让你的发票符合你的业务要求。
localize.tagline: 创建高质量发票的最简单的在线工具。

localize.description: 秩序井然，極其人性化的應用，讓你的發票開具變得像個孩子一樣。生成專業的PDF發票，一目瞭然。更改你的商標、標籤等，讓你的發票符合你的業務要求。
localize.tagline: 創建高質量發票的最簡單的在線工具。

previous.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
previous.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.

localize.description: Booste APIs将生产ML堆栈的所有痛苦归结为一行代码。我们非常兴奋地推出了OpenAI强大的新的无需训练的图像分类器的API到Python和Node。快来试试吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的图像分类器，只需一行代码。

localize.description: Booste APIs將生產ML堆棧的所有痛苦歸結爲一行代碼。我們非常興奮地推出了OpenAI強大的新的無需訓練的圖像分類器的API到Python和Node。快來試試吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的圖像分類器，只需一行代碼。

next.excerpt: Planetary is a social media app built upon the idea of protocols not platforms. Users and creators own their identities and social relationships. Privacy is respected and creators supported. Abuse and harassment is handled through community governance.
next.title: Planetary - Decentralized social media by and for the people.

localize.description: Planetary是一个建立在协议而非平台理念上的社交媒体应用。用户和创作者拥有自己的身份和社交关系。隐私得到尊重，创作者得到支持。滥用和骚扰通过社区治理来处理。
localize.tagline: 分散化的社交媒体由人民主导并为人民服务。

localize.description: Planetary是一個建立在協議而非平臺理念上的社交媒體應用。用戶和創作者擁有自己的身份和社交關係。隱私得到尊重，創作者得到支持。濫用和騷擾通過社區治理來處理。
localize.tagline: 分散化的社交媒體由人民主導併爲人民服務。
